701113f-b.title: Bronx: Giles Place - Cannon Place
701113f-b.text:
(11
3425 Giles Plaoe, west side, between Cannon Place and
Sedgwick Avenue, showing the Giles Residence owned by William
Ogden Giles. It is situated on the site of the Revolutionary
Fort Independence. The terraces of the house are the ramparts
of the old fort. The G. W. Bromley map of 1924 as revised to
September 1932 shows the masion still to be there.
1911
Gift of Randall Comfort
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE
Aeg ~Ne 76
(2)
The same, at a later date.
May 6, 1938
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
701113f-b.folder: Giles Place & Cannon Place, Bronx, NY
